feed.title: Leonard Chau - Portfolio & Engineering Blog - General

entry.title: Welcome to My EngineeringÂ Blog
entry.summary: Welcome to my personal portfolio and engineering blog. This is where I’ll share my projects, thoughts, and experiences.
entry.content:
Welcome to my engineering blog and portfolio!

This site is built with Pelican, a static site generator powered by Python. I’ll be using this space to:

  • Share engineering projects and technical insights
  • Document my learning journey
  • Showcase portfolio work
  • Write about topics that interest me

What to Expect

You’ll find posts covering:

  • Software Engineering: Development practices, tools, and techniques
  • Projects: Detailed write-ups of personal and professional projects
  • Tutorials: Step-by-step guides and how-tos
  • Thoughts: Reflections on technology and engineering

Getting Started

Feel free to explore the site using the navigation menu. You can:

  • Browse posts by tags
  • View the archives for all posts
  • Check out my projects page

Thanks for visiting, and I hope you find something interesting here!
